title: Any changes / Modifications / Amendments in the details layout or in the master plan shall be carried out by the Metropolitan Commissioner at his own level
clause_text: Any changes / Modifications / Amendments in the details layout or in the master plan shall be carried out by the Metropolitan Commissioner at his own level. However the Public Amenity / Public Utility Areas and their percentage as per original sanction shall not be changed while making Modifications / Amendments in the Schemes.
section: Special Regulations for the Improvement Schemes :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
